comments: Galloway (DET) extends his arm into Warren's (IND) path and makes contact across his front as he changes direction.
Drummond (DET) extends his left leg into Brogdon's (IND) path and initiates foot-to-foot contact that affects Brogdon's SQBR.
Turner (IND) makes marginal contact with his right hand to Drummond's (DET) shoulder as the pick is set.
Griffin (DET) establishes himself in a screening position in Lamb's (IND) path after the hand-off and does not deliver the contact.
Drummond (DET) makes contact across Sabonis' (IND) right arm and affects his ability to gain control of the loose ball.
Brogdon (IND) makes marginal body contact with Rose's (DET) side along the lane line.
Turner (IND) establishes himself in a screening position in Galloway's (DET) path and does not deliver the contact.
Galloway (DET) moves into Warren's (IND) space and initiates contact to the back of Warren's right leg during his upward shooting motion.
Brogdon (IND) makes marginal contact with Rose's (DET) backside in the lane and does not affect his ability to pass.
Griffin (DET) establishes himself in a screening position in Brogdon's (IND) path and briefly delays him as they disengage, making marginal contact.
Griffin (DET) and Turner (IND) engage and disengage during the inbound.
Drummond (DET) briefly has his arm around Sabonis' (IND) midsection before correcting.
Drummond (DET) moves laterally into Brogdon's (IND) path and turns into his side, creating contact that affects his SQBR and causes him to lose control of the ball after his gather.

call_type: Turnover: Lost Ball Out of Bounds
comments: Brogdon (IND) is the last player to touch the ball before it goes out of bounds.
Drummond (DET) establishes himself in a screening position in Brogdon's (IND) path and does not deliver the contact.
Brown (DET) legally contests Warren's (IND) jump shot attempt.

Sabonis (IND) makes marginal contact with Drummond's (DET) right shoulder that does not affect his rebounding position. Sabonis then makes incidental contact with Drummond's right arm as they each attempt to retrieve the ball.
Brogdon (IND) attempts to commit the take foul on Galloway (DET) and makes contact with his left foot, but it is marginal.
